thread.title: BRIEF-Pembina Pipeline Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.83

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pembina Pipeline Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.83
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Pembina Pipeline Corp:
* REPORTS RECORD ANNUAL RESULTS IN 2017 * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.83 * QTRLY TOTAL VOLUME 2,917 MBOE/D VERSUS 1,941 MBOE/D * QTRLY REVENUE $1,716 MILLION VERSUS $1,251 MILLION * ‍RECOGNIZED A $70 MILLION DEFERRED TAX RECOVERY IN Q4 OF 2017, LARGELY DUE TO ENACTMENT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT​
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW C$1.96 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍REMAIN ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE OF $2.55 BILLION TO $2.75 BILLION​
* PEMBINA PIPELINE - ANTICIPATE BEING ABLE TO FUND GROWING DIVIDEND AND $1 BILLION TO $2 BILLION OF CAPITAL PROJECTS PER YEAR WITHOUT ACCESSING EQUITY MARKET​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
